hackathon-prizes.prize-content: We are excited to offer a Liberty Mutual tech challenge where the winning team will win $800 (4 $200 gift cards).  Our challenge to you is to develop an idea that helps people live safer, more secure lives.  You may leverage our Shine API, which incorporates Liberty Mutual data, insurance core competencies, and city infrastructure data to help customers live a life without worry.  Featured services include Total Home Score, Vehicle Thefts, Vehicle stats, and Parking Rules.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device
Best Domain Name Registered from Domain.com
